techmeme.title: Galaxy Digital signs a non-binding deal with a US-based hyperscaler company to use its 800MW of mining capacity for hosting high-performance computers (Aoyon Ashraf/CoinDesk)
Nvidia plans to add a 100-hour monthly cap for new Performance and Ultimate GeForce Now users from January 1 to avoid raising prices "in the foreseeable future" (Tom Warren/The Verge)
MacBook Pro (16", 2024) review: fast M4 chips, brighter display, sharp 12MP Center Stage webcam, Thunderbolt 5, and long battery life, but pricey spec upgrades (Devindra Hardawar/Engadget)
iMac (2024) review: M4 is speedy, 4.5K display is lovely, six speakers is great, upgraded webcam is nice, but lacks height adjustment and a touch screen option (Alex Wawro/Tom's Guide)
Mac mini (2024) review: the M4 Pro is incredibly fast, 16GB+ of RAM, front USB-C, smaller design, and Thunderbolt 5 with M4 Pro, but overpriced spec upgrades (Devindra Hardawar/Engadget)
